refnamediv.refpurpose: Transforms an image to compensate for lens distortion.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: newimage = undistortImage(image, cameramatrix) newimage = undistortImage(image, cameramatrix, ["Parameter1", value1,["Parameter2", value2]])

listitem.para: Input vector of distortion coefficients of 4, 5, or 8 elements. If the vector is empty, the zero distortion coefficients are assumed.
Camera matrix of the distorted image. By default, it is same as cameramatrix.
Corrected image that has same size and type as original image

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The function returns a newimage containing the input image with lens distortion removed.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting: J = undistortImage(I, cameramatrix) J = undistortImage(I, cameramatrix, "distcoeffs", distcoeffs)
